alert.note: Alert for Grant (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 12 at 11:08AM MDT until further notice by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Dakota...Minnesota... South Fork Whetstone River near Milbank affecting Grant County. Minnesota River at Ortonville affecting Big Stone County. North Fork Yellow Medicine River near Milbank affecting Grant County. .Warm temperatures will melt snowpack and increase river flows. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring. * WHERE...North Fork Yellow Medicine River near Milbank. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 1045.0 feet, Major agricultural flooding begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:15 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 1044.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 11:15 AM CDT Wednesday was 1045.2 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 1041.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/abr. The next statement will be issued Thursday evening by 815 PM CDT.
